scale(double) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Group

scale(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
enlarges the vector by k, it's direction will be constant
for k between 0 and 1, the vector will be shortened
for negative k the vector will be inverted and then enlarged by positive k
scale(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
enlarges the vector by k, it's direction will be constant
for k between 0 and 1, the vector will be shortened
for negative k the vector will be inverted and then enlarged by positive k
scale(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
enlarges the vector by k, it's direction will be constant
for k between 0 and 1, the vector will be shortened
for negative k the vector will be inverted and then enlarged by positive k
scaleTo(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
scales this vector to the length of the parameter-vector, but will not change this direction
scaleTo(Vector2d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
scales this vector to the length of the parameter-vector, but will not change this direction
the parameter will not be changed
scaleTo(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
scales this vector to the length of the parameter-vector, but will not change this direction
scaleTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d

scaleTo(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d

scaleTo(Vector4d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d

the parameter will not be changed
Scene - Class in fast3d.complex
a class to combine multiple Objects
the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by ray tracing
note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the objects to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
although the contained objects can be part of a stringent 3d-scenery, they can be independent
Scene(Vector3d, Object...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Scene
 
Scene(Object...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Scene
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
Scene(Vector3d, List<Object>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Scene
 
Scene(List<Object>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Scene
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
scene - Variable in class fast3d.util.serial.F3ObjImporter
the scene loaded from the file
screenHeightPX - Variable in class fast3d.math.Shader
the screens height in pixel (the height of the physical device is used to determine the width of the resulting image)
screenWidthPX - Variable in class fast3d.math.Shader
the screens width in pixel (the width of the physical device is used to determine the width of the resulting image)

SFPUControl - Class in fast3d.simple.controls
SimpleFirstPersonUserControl
does not check collisions of the camera, not appropriate for games
WASD to move: W-forward D-right, UP/DOWN for nicking-camera-rotation, LEFT/RIGHT or mouseDrag-cameraRotation, R for up, F for down moving in moveSpeed, rotating in rotSpeed ; speeds may be set directly as fields, L to log stats
max-rotationX = +- Math.PI/3, no max-rotationY
SFPUControl(SimplePanel3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.simple.controls.SFPUControl
calls super and sets rotX and rotY to 0d
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Group
a group renders all of its triangles in the correct order
if some groups may intersect each other user-recognizable, every triangle of those groups should be rendered directly by adding them to the universe using addToUniverse()
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Object
calls shade() for every hold Group
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Scene
shades all contained objects
shade(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
converts one given vertex in pixel-coordinates
faster than getShader().shade(vertices) because of buffering-features
if a vertex is shaded to null according to the camera-mode-settings, this method will return null too
shade(List<Vector3d>) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades all vertices
shade(Vector3d...) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades all vertices
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.mtOpt.SharedShader
starts a thread shading all declared renderables
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in interface fast3d.Renderable
called when this renderable is requested to calculate where to draw on screen
the graphics-context is not clipped, so it is greatly needed to really just draw itself
during this method is is highly recommended to not draw anything
shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle

shade(Graphics3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Triangle
 
shadeAll(Vector3d...) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
converts all given vertices in pixel-coordinates
faster than getShader().shade(vertices) because of buffering-features
if a vertex is shaded to null according to the camera-mode-settings, it won't be added to the return-list
shaded - Variable in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
to shade a vertex means to calculate its position on a viewers camera-screen
to not calculate that multiple times for one image, the shaded position can be buffered here
shadedFrameID - Variable in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
if multiple images are calculated with changes in the scenery or camera movement in between it is necessary to know whether the shaded-field-value is valid or was from previous calculations
shadeIgnoreMode(List<Vector3d>) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades all vertices
returns a pixel coordinate for every given vertex
shadeIgnoreMode(Vector3d...) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades all vertices
returns a pixel coordinate for every given vertex
Shader - Class in fast3d.math
to shade means to calculate the screen-position and color of a 3d-point at a specified camera-setting
a shader is a converter from 3d to 2d
Shader(Camera, int, int) - Constructor for class fast3d.math.Shader
Wrapper for the constructor getting all the cameras vectors
shadeVertex(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades a single vertex
returns null if the vertex is not visible on the screen (does not correspond to the camera-mode-setting)
shadeVertexIgnoreMode(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Shader
shades a single vertex
returns the screen-projection-position of it even if the vertex is out of bounds of the screen or false oriented
returns never null
SharedShader - Class in fast3d.mtOpt
a support-class for MultiThreadPanel3d
holds the information about it and one shading-pipeline itself
SharedShader(Renderable[], int, int) - Constructor for class fast3d.mtOpt.SharedShader
multiple SharedShaders work on one list, each from offset length Renderables long
shininess - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.Material
the factor how wide the shine-dot of the shine-light is

SimpleControl - Class in fast3d.control
provides some protected fields to easily access the most useful properties of a SimplePanel3d
sp3d - the cast of p3d to SimplePanel3d framerate - short for sp3d.frameRate() universe - short for sp3d.getUni() cam - short for sp3d.getCam()
can be used just like a normal control

SimpleFragmentShader(SimpleUniverse, int, int) - Constructor for class fast3d.simple.fragment.SimpleFragmentShader

SimplePanel3d - Class in fast3d.simple
a default implementation of Panel3d with various features to simplify coding

solveLinearEquationSystem(double[][]) - Static method in class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation
a linear equation system (LES) has the row-form aX+bY+...
solveLinearEquationSystemZLC(double[][]) - Static method in class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation

sort(Renderable...) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
sorts the given array very fast but correct to draw the renderables then in the order of the array, so that they will hide each other in the perspectively correct order
the nearest to the camera renderable will be at the last index of the array, the most far one at first
sort(Map<Vector3d, RenderAction>) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
sorts the given keys in relation to their position to the camera and then calls the run method for the corresponding value so it can draw something
Sort - Class in fast3d.util
in a 3d-environment some objects may cover others, so it is important to detect the order (far to near) in which to render objects
the nested classes offer static methods to sort like described by the algorithms they are named like
users should normally use Sort.
Sort() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.Sort
 
sort(Vector3d, Renderable...) - Static method in class fast3d.util.Sort.Bubblesort.Renderables
sorts the given renderable-array in relation to the renderables distance to the camera considering the painters algorithm
sort(Vector3d, Renderable...) - Static method in class fast3d.util.Sort.Quicksort.Renderables
sorts all the renderables in relation to their distance to the campos
sort(Vector3d, int, int, Renderable...) - Static method in class fast3d.util.Sort.Quicksort.Renderables
sorts the renderables in the specified range of the given array in relation to their distance to the campos
sort(Vector3d, Vector3d...) - Static method in class fast3d.util.Sort.Quicksort.Vectors
sorts all the vectors in relation to their distance to the campos
sort(Vector3d, int, int, Vector3d...) - Static method in class fast3d.util.Sort.Quicksort.Vectors
sorts the vectors in the specified range of the given array in relation to their distance to the campos
Sort.Bubblesort - Class in fast3d.util
Bubblesort is usually quite slow, but very fast if the array is pre-sorted
Sort.Bubblesort.Renderables - Class in fast3d.util
a static class giving methods to sort renderables using bubblesort
Sort.Quicksort - Class in fast3d.util
Quicksort is generally the best, because fastest, way of sorting an array, but is very slow if the array is pre-sorted
Sort.Quicksort.Renderables - Class in fast3d.util
a static class giving methods to sort renderables using quicksort
Sort.Quicksort.Vectors - Class in fast3d.util
a static class giving methods to sort vectors with quicksort
specular - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.Material
the color used to illuminate with specular light (shine-light)
SpecularLight - Class in fast3d.complex.light
specular light means the shining dot on polished surfaces
SpecularLight(Universe, Color, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.light.SpecularLight
constructs a new shiny light
Sphere - Class in fast3d.simple.shapes
a geometric body builder to create spheres (no ellipses)
ellipses can be achieved by calling g.forEveryVertex(v lambda v.scale(Vector3d)); on the resulting Group
Sphere() - Constructor for class fast3d.simple.shapes.Sphere
 
start(Dimension) - Method in class fast3d.fragment.FragmentShaderManager

startRender() - Method in class fast3d.fragment.FragPanel3d
(re)starts the render process, this component is repainted automatically until the frame is completely rendered
Straight - Class in fast3d.math.geom
representing a geometric (infinitely long) straight line
a mathematical straight has no end or begin and no thickness and has no other properties than it's position and orientation
Straight(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.math.geom.Straight
constructs a new straight, both parameters must be finite
sub(Color) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Color
